nodes.label: Public
nodes.title: Everyone has this role (even unauthenticated users)

nodes.label: Authenticated
nodes.title: This role is given to all authenticated users

nodes.label: WorkspaceGuest
nodes.title: This role allows a user to audit (read only) a workspace

nodes.label: WorkspaceMember
nodes.title: This role allows a user to create workbenches in a workspace

nodes.label: WorkspaceMaintainer
nodes.title: This role allows a user to manage a workspace

nodes.label: WorkspacePI
nodes.title: This role allows a user to manage a workspace files

nodes.label: WorkspaceAdmin
nodes.title: This role allows a user full permissions over a workspace

nodes.label: WorkbenchViewer
nodes.title: This role allows a user to audit (read only) a workbench

nodes.label: WorkbenchMember
nodes.title: This role allows a user to manage app instances in a workbench and update the workbench

nodes.label: WorkbenchAdmin
nodes.title: This role allows a user to manage a workbench

nodes.label: Healthchecker
nodes.title: This role is used by the healthchecker

nodes.label: PlateformUserManager
nodes.title: This role allows a user a full control over ther user in at the platform level

nodes.label: AppStoreAdmin
nodes.title: This role allows a user to manage the app store

nodes.label: SuperAdmin
nodes.title: This role allows a user to manage the platform (sink role)
